item.title: Quest of Dungeons is out now on PlayStation 4

item.title: Quest of Dungeons is coming to PlayStation 4
item.description: EDIT: Release date will be January 17th 2017! Exciting news, Quest of Dungeons is on itâ€™s way to PlayStation 4!! Itâ€™s actually been in development for some time, and itâ€™s very near completion, so itâ€™s not going to be a huge wait until release hopefully. The official QoD page on PlayStation went live just now so I decided it was a good time to let you know that this is happening, since Iâ€™ve been getting questions about a PS4 version for some time.
